title: EVRART ORB / fishing rod convo
description: Quick attempt to catch the fishing rod...

dialogueTree.title: Reaction Speed: "Is that an Insulindian phasmid? It..."
dialogueTree.text: Is that an Insulindian phasmid? It looks like an Insulindian phasmid. Quick -- catch it before it scuttles away!

links.title: Inland Empire: "It's gotta be the phasmid this time..."
links.text: It's gotta be the phasmid this time. Look -- it moved!

links.title: You: ""Stop right there!""
links.text: "Stop right there!"

links.title: Fishing Rod: "You shout at what you thought to be..."
links.text: You shout at what you thought to be a phasmid, but turns out to be a fishing rod.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""What are you trying to accomplish,..."
links.text: "What are you trying to accomplish, Harry?"

links.title: You: ""Uh, it's a novel fishing method.""
links.text: "Uh, it's a novel fishing method."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Perhaps we should try it out in th..."
links.text: "Perhaps we should try it out in the wild sometime."

links.title: You: ""Sorry, I thought the fishing rod w..."
links.text: "Sorry, I thought the fishing rod was... something else."

links.title: Evrart Claire: "His great belly ripples with laught..."
links.text: His great belly ripples with laughter. "A skinny, shy young girl? Never mind."

links.title: You: ""I was just trying to surprise you...."
links.text: "I was just trying to surprise you. To throw you off, you know."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Well, you certainly succeeded, Har..."
links.text: "Well, you certainly succeeded, Harry." He adjust himself in the chair. "You are a very surprising police officer indeed."

links.title: You: "Pirouette toward the phasmid."
links.text: Pirouette toward the phasmid.

links.title: Fishing Rod: "Beautiful leap! But this isn't a ph..."
links.text: Beautiful leap! But this isn't a phasmid in your hand -- it is a fishing rod.

links.title: You: "Creep up to the phasmid quietly."
links.text: Creep up to the phasmid quietly.

links.title: Fishing Rod: "You're a master of stealth. But loo..."
links.text: You're a master of stealth. But look what you've caught -- not a phasmid, but a fishing rod!

links.title: You: "Wait a moment. Is that really the p..."
links.text: Wait a moment. Is that really the phasmid? You don't want to make a fool out of yourself.

links.title: Fishing Rod: "Definitely not a phasmid. Definitel..."
links.text: Definitely not a phasmid. Definitely a fishing rod.

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I see you're admiring my fishing g..."
links.text: "I see you're admiring my fishing gear. Are you by any chance a fisherman yourself?"

links.title: You: ""Fisherman? Totally. It's all I do..."
links.text: "Fisherman? Totally. It's all I do for fun."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I thought so, Harry, I thought so...."
links.text: "I thought so, Harry, I thought so. We should go out together sometime. Bond like men of worth and value."

links.title: You: ""I think maybe I used to be the Fis..."
links.text: "I think maybe I used to be the Fisher King..."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""Ha ha, maybe you were.""
links.text: "Ha ha, maybe you were."

links.title: You: ""Nah, I'm just sizing you up. Study..."
links.text: "Nah, I'm just sizing you up. Studying your strengths and weaknesses."

links.title: Evrart Claire: ""I doubt you'll learn anything from..."
links.text: "I doubt you'll learn anything from that fishing rod."
